name: Dark Lenta.Ru No banners (Desktop + Mobile)
description: Dark Lenta.Ru style with no banners. Supports https://lenta.ru and https://m.lenta.ru
css:
@-moz-document domain(lenta.ru),domain(moslenta.ru) {::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{width:10px;-webkit-box-shadow:none;background:#191919;box-shadow:none;border-left:1px solid #232322}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{-webkit-box-shadow:none;-webkit-border-radius:0;border-radius:0;background:#908b67;box-shadow:none}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:window-inactive{background:#908b67;box-shadow:none}body{background-color:#262626!important;color:#f8f8f2!important}.theme__header,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#b9b384!important}.b-header-inner__info a,.b-header__menu .b-header__menu-link:visited,.b-text a,.b-text a[href^="/tags/"],.b-topic .b-text p a,a,a.rubric{color:#b9b384!important;transition:all .4s}.b-header__menu .b-header__menu-link{color:#b9b384!important}.b-header__menu .b-header__menu-link:focus,.b-header__menu .b-header__menu-link:hover{color:#f8f8f2!important}a.dark{color:#b9b384!important}.b-tags-list .items .active,.search-bar__find-btn:active,.search-bar__find-btn:hover,a:hover{color:#f8f8f2!important;opacity:.7}input[type=text]{background:#191919;color:#f8f8f2}a:visited{opacity:.5}.b-socials__comments,.button{box-shadow:none;border-color:#191919;background:#191919;color:#f8f8f2;transition:all .4s}.b-socials__comments:before,.button:before{border-color:#191919;background-color:#191919;box-shadow:none}.b-socials__comments:active,.b-socials__comments:focus,.b-socials__comments:hover,.button:active,.button:focus,.button:hover{background:#908b67;border-color:#908b67;color:#232322;box-shadow:none}.b-currency-rate-graph svg,.b-header-inner__logo-icon,.b-header-main__logo-icon,.b-header__logo,.b-longgrid-column .item__rubric-icon,.b-tabloid .bordered-title svg,.b-topic_gallery .preview .control_mini,.b-topic_gallery .preview .control_prev_mini,.icons-active_white,.item[data-partslug=video] a:after,.svg-icons__video-play{filter:invert(1)}.b-sidebar-menu_origin{background:#191919!important}.b-longgrid-column .g-date .time,.b-topic_article .b-topic__content__author .name,.g-date .time,.g-time{color:#b9b384}.b-feature__more-arrow{fill:#b9b384}.b-specproject-item,.b-topic_gallery .announce,.b-topic_gallery .b-topic__header,.b-topic_gallery .photo,.b-video-box__info,.theme_type_longgrid{border-color:#191919}.b-gallery__info .text,.b-specproject-item .descr,.b-topic_gallery .b-topic__announce{color:#f8f8f2}.b-gallery,.b-topic__socials,.b-topic_gallery .b-text{border-color:#191919}.b-menu-decorator ul .active a{color:#b9b384!important}._b-special-offers,.b-top{background:#232322!important}._b-special-offers__header,.b-top__header{color:#f8f8f2}.b-header{margin-bottom:3rem}.itemTitle,.plistaHeadline{color:#b9b384!important}.itemText,.news-item__description,.news-item__headline,.tech-page__clean_list .container,.b-layout{margin-top:0}.b-layout{background:#232322!important;width:100%!important}.b-footer,.b-top-line{display:none}.b-adverts-sidebar,.rnet_lenta_dzen{display:none!important}.b-tags-list a,.b-topic__authors,.b-topic__date .time{color:#b9b384}.b-inline-gallery-box .info{border:0!important}.main-card,.main-column__content,.main-history__wrapper,.main-video,.main-video__text,.middle-card__content{background:#191919!important;color:#f8f8f2!important;padding-right:1rem!important}.main-card__headline,.main-column__headline,.main-column__text,.main-history__description,.main-history__headline,.main-video__description,.middle-card__headline,.middle-card__text{color:#f8f8f2!important;padding-bottom:1rem}.b-rubric-topic a,.main-quote__description{color:#f8f8f2!important}.middle-card__info{padding-bottom:1rem}.main-page__content{width:100%}.main-menu{background:#191919}.main-menu__link{color:#f8f8f2!important}.b-grid-topic
